nodes.bodyText: Yeah, I'll change it once we decide if we need to release again or not.
Any reason this comment doesn't state that null will use the current file system as the other comments have?
It's internal so I didn't bother changing it, I can change it though.

Any reason this doesn't default destinationFileSystem to the current file system? Looks like renameWithResponse will pass the current file system as the destinationFileSystem value. Seems odd to allow null in one case and not in another very similar case.
